name: Improved Channel
description: Your channeled energy is harder to resist.
benefit: Add 2 to the DC of saving throws made to resist the effects of your channel energy ability.
mythicDescription: As a divine conduit for energy, you’re unmatched.
mythicBenefit: Non-mythic creatures that take damage from your channel energy must roll their saving throws twice and take the lower result.
description_zh: 你引导的能量难以被抵抗。
